subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: O. J. Mayo is making a stopover on his way to the N.B.A. Thanks to the rule that keeps high school seniors from jumping directly to the league, Mayo is detouring to Southern California.
snippet: O. J. Mayo is making a stopover on his way to the N.B.A. Thanks to the rule that keeps high school seniors from jumping directly to the league, Mayo is detouring to Southern California.
